title: Rageblade need nerf
body: why is Rageblade still in the game the item is to brocken you cant bulid aginst it becaus it have amor and magic penatration it will be fiar if it only had one of them

replies.body: Because some champions like hybrid items and hybrid items are a neat concept. Rageblade in and of itself is far from a broken item on anyone other than Vayne anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackKnightJack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TRjKjjEv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-08-15T16:48:22.036+0000)
>
> Because some champions like hybrid items and hybrid items are a neat concept. Rageblade in and of itself is far from a broken item on anyone other than Vayne anyway.

It’s not even broken on her anymore.
I dunno. I'd say it's pretty broken on her.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackKnightJack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TRjKjjEv,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-15T17:00:44.778+0000)
>
> I dunno. I'd say it's pretty broken on her.

Don’t feel like typing it again. So I’m just gonna copy paste for you. 


Let’s put it like this. 
It takes 6 auto attacks to begin applying onhits extra at all. 
Then. It’s only every 3rd auto that gets extra. 
So Vayne without rage blade is getting 4 procs of her passive in 12 auto attacks. 

Vayne with rage blade is getting 4 procs of her passive in 11 auto attacks. 

In this meta of “blow everything up in a split second or lose” a difference that is non existent until 10+ auto attacks is not even close to strong
You know she can stack it on minions right? The enemy team would have to just sit there and open a path for you to kill her for any you just said to mean anything.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackKnightJack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TRjKjjEv,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-15T18:47:55.065+0000)
>
> You know she can stack it on minions right? The enemy team would have to just sit there and open a path for you to kill her for any you just said to mean anything.

Fine. Let’s say she pre stacked it. 

That’s still 5 auto attacks, on a single target before it makes any difference. 

5 auto attacks from a
Short ranged, squishy champion that dies instantly is someone sneezes next to her.
Like Ragna said, Vayne's ult makes her invisible. I'll admit she'd be much easier to deal with if you could see her and target her, but a competent Vayne player will not give you that chance.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackKnightJack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TRjKjjEv,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2019-08-15T19:15:17.432+0000)
>
> Like Ragna said, Vayne's ult makes her invisible. I'll admit she'd be much easier to deal with if you could see her and target her, but a competent Vayne player will not give you that chance.

Her ultimate gives her an invis on a cooldown that lasts a fraction of a second. 

You have lots of opportunities to kill he. And again. 5 attacks for the items passive to matter. In a meta where a fart kills people.
Which is more than enough. I can fight her fine as Darius when she isn't always turning invisible. I can't when she is.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackKnightJack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TRjKjjEv,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2019-08-15T19:26:28.677+0000)
>
> Which is more than enough. I can fight her fine as Darius when she isn't always turning invisible. I can't when she is.

Okay? Her invis isn’t in question here. It’s her synergy with rageblade. Which is negligible at best at the moment.
You mean the same ADC that spams invisibility with R? The same one that buys a PD?

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TRjKjjEv,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-15T19:03:40.588+0000)
>
> You mean the same ADC that spams invisibility with R? The same one that buys a PD?

PD makes zero difference when in any occasion she dies it’s by well over 150% of her health bar. 

And invis does not change how squishy she is. Nor does it change the fact that she needs 5+ auto attacks to get this done. Assuming she gets an invis on each auto (she doesn’t) that’s 5 different opportunities for you to instant kill her.

Applying a extra silver bolt proc regardless of it being either 1st 2nd or 3rd is strong. Means it takes one less auto to proc silver bolts either way.
Apparently on the PBE Kaisa's passive no longer gets stacked faster from Rageblade. Now if they do that to Vayne, we won't have her killing people 24/7 like she did until we nerfed her (aka made other ads better).
